channel.title: How do you make yourself owner on 508
channel.description: Can someone help me how I mske myself owner on a 508 server

item.title: How do you make yourself owner on 508
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“the hunt, post:1, topic:294061”][quote author=jj0001 link=topic=388990.msg2907065#msg2907065 date=1249861762]
there is no owner on a 508 server but you can make commands that only you can use
[/quote]

no, get a brain please.[/quote]
in 317 server there was player rights 3 and that was owner now there is only 0-2

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make yourself owner on 508

item.title: How do you make yourself owner on 508
item.dc:creator: @Ii_Claw_iI Ii Claw iI
item.description:
@Ii_Claw_iI wrote:

Open your 508 source folder and find folder called"characters" then find your account name here and open it with WordPad then find character rights and replace the 0 with 2.
Hope i helped

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make yourself owner on 508
